United Nations sees international tourism fully recovering in 2024Global tourism is set to fully recover from the pandemic in 2024 as international tourist arrivals will likely be 2% more numerous than in 2019, the United Nations' World Tourism Organisation said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 08:09:31 GMT YNDAMUWOBBIS5HPTLTCWLDLTLY https://www.reuters.com/business/united-nations-sees-international-tourism-filled-recovering-2024-2024-01-19/Reuters商业
Explainer: What does Red Sea disruption mean for Europe's economy?Weeks of attacks by Iranian-backed Houthi militants on vessels in the Red Sea have disrupted shipping in the Suez Canal, the fastest sea route between Asia and Europe carrying 12% of global container traffic. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 06:16:31 GMT 3PHTX4QR75PIXEIHVFFTWY3EGQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/what-does-red-sea-disruption-mean-european-economy-2024-01-19/Mark John市场宏观问题
Chinese fund managers dig deep into own pockets to launch equity fundsIn the face of intense pressure from authorities to help revive a sickly stock market, Chinese fund management companies are increasingly launching equity funds that are bankrolled mostly by the firm's own money. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 06:16:08 GMT TTXPXWHZKVJSJNPKNK6IGDNG74 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-fund-managers-dive-deep-into-own-pockets-launch-equity-funds-2024-01-19/Samuel Shen, Vidya Ranganathan世界中国
U.S. wants Japanese shipyards to help keep warships ready to fight in AsiaThe United States and Japan are looking to make a deal for Japanese shipyards to regularly overhaul and maintain U.S. Navy warships so they can stay in Asian waters ready for any potential conflict, U.S. Ambassador to Japan Rahm Emanuel said on Friday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 05:43:14 GMT 4FPQRV5FK5M6NCJ7IDRJJYETOA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-eyeing-japanese-shipyards-warship-overhauls-says-us-ambassador-2024-01-19/John Geddie, Tim Kelly世界亚太地区
India takes investment spotlight while risks weigh in China - Suntory CEOJapanese drinks maker Suntory is prioritising expansion in India while taking a cautious stance on business in China, especially given concerns over spy laws recently used to detain foreign workers, Chief Executive Takeshi Niinami said in an interview. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 03:30:57 GMT USBDSBALNJO63MZD3Y3U5QSW4I https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/india-takes-investment-spotlight-while-risks-weigh-china-suntory-ceo-2024-01-19/Divya Chowdhury, Rocky Swift商业零售与消费品
Oil prices tick up as markets weigh Middle East tensions, supply forecastsOil prices rose on Friday as geopolitical tensions and oil output disruptions in the U.S., the world's biggest producer, caused by cold weather overshadowed concerns about slow Chinese demand growth and forecasts for ample supply. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 02:05:36 GMT EU7MAHUWWBPPVAT7R54FQSDDXI https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/oil-prices-drift-lower-china-demand-worries-2024-01-19/Yuka Obayashi, Andrew Hayley市场商品
Red Sea shipping attacks pressure China's exporters as delays, costs mountFor Chinese businessman Han Changming, disruptions to Red Sea freight are threatening the survival of his trading company in the eastern province of Fujian. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 02:02:36 GMT UW7H773Y4JP77N74TTLVEV7E4U https://www.reuters.com/world/red-sea-crisis-Pressures-china-exporters-shipping-delays-costs-mount-2024-01-19/Samuel Shen, Casey Hall, Ellen Zhang世界
China flirts with Mao era growth: McGeeverThe latest readouts on economic and population trends in China are remarkable, highlighting the immense long-term challenges ahead and dragging the growth profile of the world's second-largest economy back to the insular days of the 1970s. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 01:48:10 GMT K6NGFQAOA5NMDADPOU77VRXZ54 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-flirts-with-mao-era-growth-mcgeever-2024-01-19/Jamie McGeever世界中国
USTR deputy Bianchi to depart as top trade official for AsiaThe Biden administration's top trade official for Asia, Sarah Bianchi, is stepping down as the U.S. Trade Representative's office plots its next moves on trade talks with Indo-Pacific countries after failing to reach a deal in November, the White House confirmed on Thursday. Fri, 19 Jan 2024 00:41:26 GMT 2NVADB2BQNMGZBEOWKNIQDNRD4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us/ustr-deputy-bianchi-departs-top-trade-official-asia-2024-01-19/David Lawder世界美国
US urges discussions with China on practical nuclear risk reduction stepsThe United States does not expect formal nuclear arms-control negotiations with China anytime soon, but does want to see a start of discussions on practical risk-reduction measures, a senior White House official said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:24:07 GMT SBBOZ2QLRJLLRABKQGZHHXITQU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-urges-discussions-with-china-practical-nuclear-risk-reduction-steps-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
US, Chinese finance officials open meetings in BeijingU.S. Treasury and Chinese Finance Ministry officials started a two-day meeting in Beijing on Thursday to discuss financial stability and capital markets issues between the two economic powers, deepening an engagement revived last year. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 16:21:33 GMT Z22ZWSABUBNF5EK2YXWFBJT77A https://www.reuters.com/business/us-chinese-finance-officials-open-meetings-beijing-2024-01-18/Reuters商业
